description: This file is a shell script that acts as a wrapper for starting and managing a database preview environment. It delegates startup commands to startup.sh, checks for the presence of node.js scripts, and provides fallback mechanisms such as a simple HTTP response via netcat or an infinite tail to keep the container alive.

methods.name: main logic in script
methods.description: Sets up permissions, runs startup.sh, and attempts to start a health server or keep the container alive with fallback mechanisms.
